text: hi i’m a graduate of this school, class of 2021. the school offers excellent academic preparation, particularly for PSLE, with numerous mock tests and extra classes for students needing help in specific subjects. however, socially, many students tend to be self-centred, two-faced etc. if your child is not easily influenced by the behaviour of others, i would recommend this school for its strong academic support
this school is so good, not scary. scary roti, scary scary roti.

I'm glad the teacher there teach us to behave and learn from our mistakes. If there was no strict teachers, there will be no discipline among the students and they will keep on making the same mistake. The strict teachers will also later on apologies if they were too harsh on the students

School is halal but not at the same time. The students there act like they self entitled and should respect the teachers more. Parents should stop complaining and teach their children manners instead of scolding the teacher on how to do their job☺️

I was a student in Madrasah Irsyad Zuhri Al-Islamiah and through the six years in this school i have gain knowledge, confidence and even strength. The teachers were supportive and very motivating. They have also made me love school even more, the mistakes I’ve made and how they treated me only made me a better person and i as a student appreciate that treatment. I really hope to see more students entering this school so that they can learn their best and teach others when they’ve gain knowledge.
